entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023
